Articles.Content:
Hi all!

Before I start...
A big applause to the dev. team with new version!

 The big elephant in the room, as you may know of - mods crashing KSP.
I know that KSP dev. is not responsible for the game crashing with mods that is not compatible with the new KSP version, and this is not to complain.
Just a regular, yet stupid, question..

Does anyone know, which mods that are compatible?
Or how to find out?

In Ckan, on the right side you will find ''Metadata'' etc etc, and at the end - ''Versions''.
I deleted KSP and Ckan, to re-install both with pure memory files and just download those who are filtered with Compatible.

As I picked out my lovely mods, I double checked if it actually was compatible in the ''Versions'' window.

At the end I had only those who should be compatible with the KSP v.1.3.0.1804.
But no, still crashing.

And im not sure which one is the cause?
Tried to only install mods from linuxgurugamer, and those work fine. (Nice work dude/dudette)
They also have the green mark in the version window, so im not sure whats compatible and not, and how to find out.

Anyone knows?
This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions.
Let my counter with an other stupid question then; what version number does your KSP show?

-Update-
Yesterday I tried to do some re-install of mods again - filtered compatible.
Now it works fine, so the modders or/and the KSP dev. team has done great work.

Only issue at the moment is the explotion animation for BDArmory mods when a bomb/missile explodes, but thats not really a big issue and I guess it will be fix'd in no time
